thread.title: Still Crying From That Emotional This Is Us Episode? Watch This
thread.title_full: Still Crying From That Emotional This Is Us Episode? Watch This

author: Kelsie Gibson
title: Still Crying From That Emotional This Is Us Episode? Watch This
text:
This Is Us Apologizes For Making You Cry Video Still Crying From That Emotional This Is Us Episode? Watch This February 22, 2017 
â€” People Magazine (@people) February 22, 2017 
This Is Us makes us cry like no other show on TV, and for that the cast is truly sorry. The stars recently released a PSA where they addressed the show's sad, shocking, and downright heartbreaking themes . Even though they're sorry about the amount of tissues we use and the amount of wine we buy week after week, there is one thing they won't apologize for: making us feel emotions . "Life is complicated," they tell the camera. "Parents make mistakes, siblings don't always see eye to eye . . . bottom line: this is us." Honestly, we wouldn't have it any other way. Related:
